settings.coltext1:
ABOUT SURF'N'WEAR SURF SHOP
In business for over 50 years, Surfn' Wear's Beach House is the go-to surf shop and clothing store for both local surfers and tourists alike. Whether shopping for surfboards to hit big waves or for relaxing on the sand, we have it! Plus shop our collection of clothing for Men, Women, Kids from all major surf brands.
settings.text2: Subscribe to our newsletter and be the first to know about online only deals, special offers, new products, store news and more!

settings.popupcontentshipping:
Surf N' Wear's Beach House ships all DOMESTIC ORDERS using USPS. Customer have a choice of options depending on how fast they would like their order delivered by choosing either First Class Mail (if available, weight dependent) and Priority

INTERNATIONAL ORDERS can be shipped using USPS or UPS. Customers may choose during checkout how they would like to ship their orders and are given the prices for all shipping options available. 

Domestic Shipping
We strive to ship as promptly as a small business can. We fulfill merchandise Monday through Friday from our California Warehouse. Customers that provide us with your email address will receive a shipment confirmation.

APO Addresses
Surf N' Wear ships via the United States Post Office for APO addresses. USPS charges domestic rates for packages addressed to an APO. Surf N' Wear provides a USPS tracking number which enables you to track your package. USPS personnel stated it may take two weeks to arrive to an international military base and It may take longer to reach the service person, depending on his or her locale.

When shipping to an APO address, please use "United States" as the country when filling out the address. For County, please select Armed Forces Americas, Armed Forces Europe, or Armed Forces Pacific, whichever is applicable.

settings.text1: AS SEEN ON TV AND MOVIES
settings.text2: Iconic Yater shirt made popular from being worn on screen in famous movies and TV shows. T-shirt was first worn by Lieutenant Colonel William "Bill" Kilgore in classic movie Apocalypse Now. The military green Yater shirt was also recently featured on the hit Amazon TV show Bosch. Main character Harry Bosch, actor Titus Welliver, can be seen wearing same authenic shirt sold by us.

Hats, shirts, tank tops and other clothing featuring our exclusive Charlie Don't Surf design from movie APOCALYPSE NOW. Clothing conveys military symbolism and imagery from movie and accompanied by the Yater Surfboards logo.

Available in colors MILITARY GREEN or BLACK. Available in short sleeve t-shirts, long sleeve shirts, tank top and hoodie sweatshirts.

settings.product_item_small_description: Favorite closet staple and can be worn year-round. Made in USA and 100% Hypoallergenic, our high quality premium beanies are soft, durable and a friend to your skin.

settings.text2: Enjoy 15% off your first order when you join our mailing list.
